{{Infobox National football team | Name = {{flagicon|LIB}} [[Lebanon]] | Badge = | FIFA Trigramme = LIB | FIFA Rank = | 1st ranking date = | FIFA max = | FIFA max date = | FIFA min = | FIFA min date = | Elo Rank = | Nickname = [[Cedrus libani|The Cedars]] | Association = [[Federation Libanaise de Football Association|Federation Libanaise de
Football Association]] | Confederation = [[Asian Football Confederation|AFC]] and [[West Asian Football Federation|WAFF]] | Coach = {{flagicon|LIB}} [[Samir Saad]] | Most caps = | Top scorer = | Home Stadium = [[Camille Chamoun Sports City Stadium]] and [[Saida International Stadium]] | pattern_la1=|pattern_b1=|pattern_ra1=| leftarm1=C00000|body1=C00000|rightarm1=C00000|shorts1=FFFFFF|socks1=C00000| pattern_la2=|pattern_b2=_thinredsides|pattern_ra2=| leftarm2=FFFFFF|body2=FFFFFF|rightarm2=FFFFFF|shorts2=FFFFFF|socks2=FFFFFF| First game = | Largest win = | Largest loss = | World cup apps = | World cup best = | Regional name = [[AFC U-19 Championship]] | Regional cup apps = 1 | Regional cup best = Group Stage, 2008 }} The '''Lebanon national under-20 football team''' represents the [[Republic of Lebanon]] in the under-20, the under-19 or youth football competitions. Their official nickname is '''The Cedars'''. The team is controlled by the [[Federation Libanaise de Football Association]] (FLFA) which is a member of the [[FIFA]], the [[Asian Football Confederation]] (AFC) and also the [[West Asian Football Federation]] (WAFF). The team has never qualified for the [[FIFA U-20 World Cup]]. They only have a one participation in the [[AFC U-19 Championship 2008]]. The U20 team has produced notable players such as [[Roda Antar]], [[Youssef Mohamad]] and [[Mohammed Ghaddar]]. ==External Links== * [http://www.fifa.com/associations/association=lib/index.html#gender=m Lebanon at FIFA website] * [http://www.the-afc.com/en/about-afc/member-associations/816-member-associations/25-federation-libanaise-de-football-association Lebanon at AFC website] {{Football in Lebanon}} {{International Football}} {{AFC teams}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Lebanon National Football Team}} [[Category:Asian national association football teams]] [[Category:Lebanon national football team| ]]
